headline: Ameriprise Financial Donates More Than $3.5 Million to Nonprofits and Key Philanthropic Partners, Supporting Its Local Communities
summary: MINNEAPOLIS, June 23, 2025--Ameriprise Financial, Inc. (NYSE: AMP) today announced it has donated nearly $2 million to more than 85 nonprofits across the U.S. as part of its first-round of 2025 grants. The firm also provided an additional $1.58 million in matching donations made by its employees and advisors since the start of the year. Ameriprise is committed to supporting the communities where its people live and work by making grants primarily in its largest employee centers. The grants focus
